lead_paragraph: BOWDEN--Barbara A.,81, of Garden City, NY on February 17, 2016. Beloved daughter of the late Alfred and Emily Bowden. Cherished sister of Juliana Schmitt (Lou), Emily and the late Pamela. Dear aunt of James Schmitt, Amy Herman and Thomas Schmitt. Memorial Visitation Monday, 4-7pm at Fairchild Sons Funeral Home, Inc., 1201 Franklin Avenue, Garden City, NY. Mass Tuesday, 10am at St. Joseph's R.C. Church, Garden City, NY. ln lieu of flowers, donations in Barbara's memory may be sent to: St. Jude Children's Research Hospital, 501 St. Jude Place, Memphis, TN 38105. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BOWDEN, BARBARA A.
